Stock #: C538 Exterior Color: Yellow Interior Color: Black Body Type: Coupe Transmission: M Engine: 4.4 Litre V12 Title Condition: Clear Vehicle Description 1 of 1,284 BuiltNumbers Matching ExampleComplete Meticulous Ground-Up RestorationImpeccable Fly Yellow ExteriorBeautiful Black Leather InteriorDocumented Ownership HistoryFactory A/C & Power WindowsOriginal Manuals, Jack & Tool KitFrom one of the finest collections on Chicagos North Shore, the fastidious owner of this Daytona has been a customer of TLD for the last 40 years. Presented in Fly Yellow livery with a black leather interior, this... car is in impeccable condition both cosmetically and mechanically! The car features excellent panel gaps, gleaming britework and a laser straight body. The chassis is just as nice and shows the attention to detail as well. Inside the cockpit, new leather and mouse hair were applied accordingly and features include power windows, Becker AM/FM cassette radio and air conditioning.Folding the hood forward reveals the original V12 engine upgraded with P6 grind cams, European headers and 3.90 gearing. In this configuration the car produces approximately 400 horsepower and has awesome acceleration! To help get power to the ground a pair of matching 9 rims were added to the rear with all new Michelin XWX tires. The car has just been fully serviced and all systems are currently in working order, including the air conditioning system. This Daytona is one of the finest available and will make a great addition to any collection. Please give us a call today to find out more! Contact us now at 847-960-3386 for more details! Fusion Luxury Motors’ established foundation with our clients allows us to help you navigate through the exit process while ensuring a seamless and headache free transition. Description: --> Year: 2016 Mileage: 864 VIN: ZFF79ALAXG0217985 Primary color: Transmission type: 7-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission with manual override Engine: 8 Cylinder Engine 2016 Ferrari 488 GTB W/ Custom Carbon Fiber Mesha Design Body Kit - 864 Miles !! The Ferrari 488 GTB was introduced in 2015 to replace the previous 458 Italia. The 488 GTB was named "The Supercar of the Year 2015" by car magazine Top Gear, as well as becoming Motor Trend's 2017 "Best Driver's Car". Powered by a 3.9 Liter all-aluminum dry sump unit Turbocharged with two parallel ball-bearing twin-scroll turbochargers with air-to-air intercoolers and compressor wheels made of low-density TiAl alloy often used in jet engines to reduce inertia and resist high temperatures within the turbocharger. The engine produces 661 HP and 561 lbft of torque allowing a 0-60MPH sprint in a neck snapping 2.7 Seconds. To further enhance the body lines of this amazing machine, this 488 GTB has been outfitted with a Misha Design Carbon Fiber Body Kit. The Front Diffuser, Hood, Wide Body Fenders, Side Skirts, Rear Deck, Spoiler and Rear Diffuser are made entirely out of Carbon Fiber. The exposed matte Carbon adds an amzing contrast against the Ferrari Rosso Corsa making this 488 a real head turner. Tastefully lowered (original springs included as well) onto Savini SV-F2 Wheels with brand new Michilin Pilot Tires, this 488 has the perfect stance. With just over 800 miles, this 488 GTB is an incredible value and a true Italian Masterpiece. Great lease rates and Financing also available on any of our inventory! Buy Sell Trade Consignments Welcome! Vehicle Description $358,747 MSRP! $66,870 Savings over the Window Sticker! One-Owner. Panoramic Roof. Satellite Navigation. Back-Up Camera. Heated Front Seats. Passenger Display. Apple Carplay. Carbon Fiber Steering Wheel + LEDs. Front Grill with Chromed Edges. Paddle Shifters. Engine StartStop Button. Power Folding Mirrors. Bluetooth. Satellite Radio. USB Adapter. Horse Stitched on Headrests. "Scuderia Ferrari" Shields. Nero Mats with Logo. Dual Climate. Power Seats with Memory. Bi-Xenon Headlights. Manettino on the Steering Wheel. Adaptive Magnaride Suspension. Spoiler on Panoramic Roof in Nero. Carbon... Ceramic Brake System. Yellow Brake Calipers. Power Tailgate. Front and Rear Parking Sensors. 20 Inch Forged Painted Wheels. 680 Horsepower. The GTC4 Lusso: Four as in four-wheel drive. Four as in the four comfortable seats that cocoon driver and occupants alike. A four-seater that utterly changes the whole GT sports car concept, hailing nothing short of a revolution in the automotive world. This is the 2017 Ferrari GTC4Lusso! The Lusso is modern, innovative, futuristic and stunningly elegant: the perfect marriage of aerodynamic constraints and the rules of design. Dressed in stunning Bianco Avus over Cuoio leather seats, this 6.3L V12 produces an awe-inspiring 680 horsepower and 514 lb-ft of torque and comes ready for its next owner. It is future and history in one: the very best of the past is alive in the unique architecture and design of this four-seater, conceived to underscore the sporting stance of a car designed to tackle all weathers and all road surfaces. It may be a car that has elegance, beauty and art in its soul, but there's much, much more to the Lusso than sophisticated allure. With an MSRP of $358,747.00, this is your opportunity to acquire a Ferrari like no other for a fraction of the cost! Vehicle Description 2015 Ferrari F12 BerlinettaHere is a 2015 used Ferrari F12 Berlinetta with just 12k miles. Finished in Argento Nurburgring silver over black leather/alcantara interior with Rosso Corsa stiching, this pre-owned Ferrari is a true beauty in excellent condition. The F12 is a front-engine, rear wheel drive grand tourer that made its debut in 2012 at the Geneva Motor Show. The F12 replaced the 599 series grand tourers, and sharing stylistic similarities with the 599, the FF and... the 458--a perfect blend of the past and present. The impressive engine under the hood of this used F12 boasts 731 horsepower, 508 lb-ft of torque, a top speed of 211 mph, and can sprint from 0-62 mph in just 3.1 seconds. About Toy Barn Cars Who is the Toy Barn of Dublin? "Born in a barn" in Dublin, were a family owned, full service pre-owned automobile Dealership serving Dublin, OH since 1998. The Toy Barn of Dublin offers premium high-line vehicle sales and service to our Dublin, OH area customers, not to mention all over the United States, as well as world-wide. From Italian exotic vehicles and luxury SUVs, to powerful American muscle and premium German performance sedans, we know anyone looking for a vehicle near Dublin, as well as all over the country, will likely find what they want at our dealership. We carry an eclectic mix of vehicles, making us a good choice as your Dublin car dealer. We offer one of the finest and most comprehensive inventories available in the Midwest, all hand-selected under a simple formula: it needs to be fun! We not only sell premium vehicles, but we also service all makes and models including German, American, Italian, Japanese, and much more, from performance/exotic to luxury/4-wheel-drive models. We offer auto financing to help our customers purchase the car of their dreams, and also can offer door to door shipping, both local and world-wide. Call us here at the Toy Barn of Dublin or come visit us in person. Were convenient to Dublin and located at 5100 Post Road and look forward to helping you purchase your new dream machine. Contact us now at 740-796-8033 for more details! About Toy Barn Cars Who is the Toy Barn of Dublin? "Born in a barn" in Dublin, were a family owned, full service pre-owned automobile Dealership serving Dublin, OH since 1998. The Toy Barn of Dublin offers premium high-line vehicle sales and service to our Dublin, OH area customers, not to mention all over the United States, as well as world-wide. From Italian exotic vehicles and luxury SUVs, to powerful American muscle and premium German performance sedans, we know anyone looking for a vehicle near Dublin, as well as all over the country, will likely find what they want at our dealership. We carry an eclectic mix of vehicles, making us a good choice as your Dublin car dealer. We offer one of the finest and most comprehensive inventories available in the Midwest, all hand-selected under a simple formula: it needs to be fun! We not only sell premium vehicles, but we also service all makes and models including German, American, Italian, Japanese, and much more, from performance/exotic to luxury/4-wheel-drive models. We offer auto financing to help our customers purchase the car of their dreams, and also can offer door to door shipping, both local and world-wide. Call us here at the Toy Barn of Dublin or come visit us in person. Were convenient to Dublin and located at 5100 Post Road and look forward to helping you purchase your new dream machine. Stunning! The F12 Berlinetta debuted at the 2012 Geneva Motor Show, and replaced the 599 grand tourer.The naturally aspirated 6.3 liter Ferrari V12 engine in the F12berlinetta has won the International Engine of the Year Awards 2013 in the Best Performance category and Best Engine above 4.0 liters. The F12berlinetta was named "The Supercar of the Year 2012" by car magazine Top Gear. The 6,262 cc (6.3 L; 382.1 cu in), naturally aspirated 65 V12 engine produces 730 HP at 8,250 RPM and 509 lbft of torque at 6,000 rpm. This allows the F12 to reach 0-62 MPH in 3.1 Seconds and 120 MPH in 8.5 Seconds with a top speed of 211 MPH. This Black Beauty is fitted with a tasteful, custom body kit that gives it a bit of an edge versus other F12's. Carbon Fiber is used for the front spoiler, side skirts, rear diffuser and decklid spoiler. With staggered wheels, the stance is perfect. With Just over 12K miles, this Italian Stallion is ready to prance! Great lease rates and Financing also available on any of our inventory! Buy Sell Trade Consignments Welcome! About Fusion Luxury Motors: Fusion Luxury Motors is the most unique Independent Luxury Exotic Automobile Dealership on the west coast located in Los Angeles California. With a high emphasis on Contemporary Ultra Exotic & Vintage/Classic Cars, due to the extensive experience & passion of Yoel Wazana. In addition to the inventory that is owned by us, we also welcome vehicles on a consignment basis. Our extensive client portfolio allows Fusion Luxury Motors to place cars with anonymity, or give it the global exposure when needed. We operate with a core fundamental of establishing trust and long standing relationships with each of our clients. PROCUREMENT, TRADE-IN AND CONSIGNMENT The passion for vehicles is ever changing, and exiting a vehicle can be a dreaded step in the automobile industry. Fusion Luxury Motors’ established foundation with our clients allows us to help you navigate through the exit process while ensuring a seamless and headache free transition. This includes selling, trading-in, or consigning your vehicle to us. CUSTOMIZED VEHICLE SOURCING We welcome each of our clients’ uniqueness and understand that at times, the vehicle of their dreams needs to be located. Fusion Luxury Motors’ comprehensive experience and deeply rooted relationships within the Exotic and Vintage/Classic automobile industry allow us to locate the rarest and most obscure vehicles to meet your desires. We personally inspect each vehicle and allow you to proceed with confidence while never breaching the trust you place with us. He also, at that time, had a Capristo exhaust installed (the factory one will come with the car). Prior to his purchase he also requested all of the sticky buttons be addressed. Anyone who owns a Ferrari knows problem is common, annoying, and expensive to address. The car has all of the books, tools, etc., which can be seen in the photos. These cars have appreciated more in the last few years than almost any Ferrari of the modern era. Many experts have predicted these will continue to increase in value significantly in the years to come. This is a rare change to own a car that not only turns heads, but also will almost certainly appreciate. The only reason my friend decided to sell the car is that he had some other investment opportunities arise and his wife asked him to sell one of his Ferraris before pursuing another venture. The car also comes with the factory cover, seat cover, and wheel cover. If you have any questions at all please don't hesitate to call. This is your chance to own a an exotic car that is actually a solid investment. These don't come available often so don't let this one pass you by. MILES, 2-OWN, CLEAN HISTORY, FULL SERVICE, LUGGAGE & TOOL KIT, PRISTINE Stock #: 0026-TPA Exterior Color: Red Interior Color: Black Body Type: Coupe Transmission: 5 Speed Manual Engine: 4.9L F12 Title Condition: Clear Vehicle Description The Ferrari Testarossa was an icon from day one. It looked as aggressive as a V12 Ferrari should, but not all of them were created equal. This one is an ultra-desirable 1986 model with exceptionally low miles, and maintenance history (including a recent full service.) This is also only a 2-owner car, which is extremely rare to see in the exotic car world where cars often change hands frequently. Some cars are called the poster-child for a company, but for... an entire generation, the Testarossa was genuinely the poster of choice for every child's room. The wild styling of Testarossa earned this envy because it was how a supercar from Ferrari should look. While the car's redhead name is a reference to the cam covers and a tribute to the legendary 250 TR, it's also really the best color for this iconic prancing horse. Of course we say that because the paintwork on our exceptionally well-preserved classic is the kind of pristine many in our showroom have described as "flawless." This is a sign of special care that you can see in every picture of this thoroughly original Ferrari. While all Testarossas came with the same angular and aggressive styling that ran from the long flat nose right through the seductively wide rear end, this one was the final year for the now-collectable "flying mirror". The high mounted single driver mirror is a piece of brazen automotive asymmetry that could only be pulled off with this car's Italian flair. The Testarossa represented the upper echelon of society, and so of course, the interior delivered a level of refinement worthy of its price tag. The Nero leather seats still look amazing, especially with the prancing horse embossed in the headrest. They are grippy enough for a supercar, but Ferrari made sure that the Testarossa had a grand touring level of comfort. That's also why these cars came with comfort features like air conditioning, power seats, power steering, power windows, tilt steering wheel, and an AM/FM/cassette stereo neatly tucked away under a cover on the dashboard. All of this was standard equipment straight from Maranello. In fact, there was only one option for the Testarossa. This coupe's six-piece Schedoni custom luggage set that fits behind the seats and trunk has the kind of rarity that starts bidding wars all on its own. The mid-mounted 4.9-liter boxer V12 was the culmination of this motor at Ferrari. The 380 hp fuel-injected engine was a 14% increase in power over the last Berlinetta Boxer predecessor, and the Testarossa had 0 to 60 mph times could compete with its cross-Italy rival, the Lamborghini Countach. But since this has matured into a classic that's welcomed at any concours, there is a new set of rules in Testarossa shopping. This is a fully numbers-matching car with exceptionally low miles at 14,277. The CarFax on this car is 100% clean and reports no issues. When a car has averaged less than 500 miles per year, the next step is to look at its maintenance records. You'll see that this Ferrari has not only been preserved, but also maintained. This includes a recent full service (all belts, fluids, and clutch master cylinder) from the Ferrari technicians at Reeves Motorcars. It even has its correct single bolt wheels with Michelin TRX tires (concours judges look for that.) But as much as this one is ready to be an award-winner, we'll bet you won't be able to resist grabbing the leather three-spoke steering wheel with one hand and the iconic gated five-speed shifter with the other and really opening this one up on the backroads. After all, a Ferrari is a thing of beauty, but no one really falls in love until you hear that racecar exhaust note. This car comes with everything original from the manuals to the ultra-rare tool kit that's never been used. This Ferrari is the one time you can meet your hero, and it won't disappoint. Finished in Bianco over Nero leather with factory Boxer paint, this 308 maintains it's original factory specifications. Accompanying this example is a binder of service records that have been well kept since birth. Most recently in 2015, this 308 underwent a full major belt service. The Ferrari 308 is a V8 mid-engined, two-seater sports car manufactured from 1975 to 1985 that replaced the Dino 246 in 1975 and was updated as the 328 in 1985. The 308 is considered the most recognizable Ferrari ever produced, made famous by the hit series, "Magnum P.I." The 308 is arguably one of the most collectible Ferrari models on the market, specifically the Quattrovavole models, only 3,790 of which were produced between 1982 and 1985. Description: --> Year: 1989 Mileage: 7120 VIN: ZFFSG17A0K0079506 Primary color: Transmission type: 5 Speed Manual Engine: 4.9L V12 F 1989 Ferrari Testarossa - 7K Miles, Factory Luggage, Pristine in every way!!!! The Ferrari Testarossa (Type F110) is a 12-cylinder mid-engine car that was designed to replace the outgoing 512 BBI. The Testarossa name paid homage to the famed World Sportscar Champion 1957 Ferrari 250 Testa Rossa sports racing car. Testa Rossa, which literally means "red head" in Italian, refers to the red-painted cam covers sported by both cars' 12-cylinder engines. Pininfarina's body was a departure from the curvaceous 512 BBI and created some initial controversy. The side strakes that spanned from the doors to the rear fenders were needed for rules in several countries outlawing large openings on cars. The Testarossa had twin radiators in the back with the engine instead of a single radiator up-front. In conjunction the strakes provided cool air to the rear-mounted side radiators, thus keeping the engine from overheating. The strakes also made the Testarossa wider at the rear than in the front, thus increasing stability and handling while eventually becoming one of the most famous design elements. Like its predecessor, the Testarossa used double wishbone front and rear suspension systems. Ferrari improved traction by adding 10-inch-wide alloy rear wheels. The Testarossa drivetrain was also an evolution of the BB 512i. Its engine used near identical displacement and compression ratio, but unlike the BB 512i had four-valve cylinder heads that were finished in red. The Testarossa sports a 4.9-litre flat-12 engine with each cylinder having four valves and compression of 9.2 to Lubrication is via a dry sump system. This resulted in 390 HP and 361 ft-lb of Torque allowing the Testarossa to post a 0-60 MPH time of 5.2 Seconds and a top speed of just of 180 MPH. Testarossas are rising in value and are becoming sought after additions to collectors. This amazing example is a 3 owner California car that is absolutely stunning. Complete with RARE FACTORY LUGGAGE SET, Factory Tool Kit, Factory Car Cover, Books and Dealer Brochures. The car has been meticulously cared for and it shows from the shine of the paint to the amazingly well kept interior, including the driver's seat that shows minimal wear. Finished in Iconic Ross Corsa over Tan, this Red Head will not last long. Great lease rates and Financing also available on any of our inventory! Buy Sell Trade Consignments Welcome! Please email concierge@fusionluxurymotors.com or call 1-818-773-8181 Dealer's Information 20837 Nordhoff St, Chatsworth, CA, 91311, US (818) 773-8181 concierge@fusionluxurymotors.com Contact Seller--> www.fusionluxurymotors.com View our other auctions Email to friend

Get started now » ABOUT US Hurst Autoplex Mitsubishi is family owned and operated by the Baum family with over 35 years in the automobile industry. Being a franchise dealer we offer an entire range of vehicles at competitive pricing with the pride of a successful transaction that only a family operation can offer. Hurst Autoplex is the Pre-Owned division of Hurst Autoplex Mitsubishi, located in the same location. Our family of dealerships have consistently been one of the top 5 Mitsubishi stores in the nation and #1 in the state of Texas. We are proud to announce that Hurst Autoplex has opened a newly-renovated state of the art facility located on 4 acres directly off NE Loop 820. For your convenience our indoor showroom provides you with the ability to shop comfortably rain or shine. You will find a complete range of vehicles to fit your every need. From a family hauling SUV to a luxurious sedan, we have it all. Some of our customers still ask “What is a Mitsubishi dealer doing with this type of car”. The owner of our dealership is our buyer and he did not want the dealership limited to a few certain brands. Our inventory consists of trade-ins, lease vehicles, and program cars. He personally hand picks our late model and 'highline' vehicles which are usually one owner with a remaining warranty. Hurst Autoplex promotes a family atmosphere for its employees and our wonderful customers. The dealership claims low employee turnover and dedicated customer service. We have learned to listen to our customers helping us to fulfill your needs. We are competitive without sacrificing quality service, our integrity, or our 100% commitment to you-our most valuable asset. TERMS & CONDITIONS Out of State Buyers Because of our reputation for selling great automobiles at a wholesale price, buyers come from all over the United States to purchase from Hurst Autoplex. Out-of-state buyers have two options when purchasing a vehicle from us.Option A: Buy & ShipThis is our most popular option. We can facilitate the entire deal via email and FedEx. We handle every facet including Finance & Shipping. Cash Buyers get their paperwork sent via electronically. Once all the paperwork is done, we will arrange for your vehicle to be picked up and delivered directly to your door. We usually can get it picked up within 1-3 days and delivery takes about 2-4 days. Option B: Take Delivery here with VIP Treatment-FREE HOTEL STAY!If you would like to enjoy some time in sunny Dallas, Texas...Then choose Option B. Take a few days and make a weekend trip of it. Hurst Autoplex can make hotel arrangements for you to stay for the night! One night stay for FREE. Play golf, visit historic sites, or simply relax. Depending on the season you can come see one of our Professional Sports Teams- Cowboys, Rangers, Mavericks, or Stars-play at the most premier stadiums in the country. • You Fly to DFW Airport or Love Field-we pick you up right at your gate. • We bring you to the dealership to complete your purchase. • You enjoy your stay or make a road-trip home! Or, we can arrange to have your car shipped to your home or office, and fly back.Note: In certain cases, if you are overseas or out of town for an extended period of time but have found the car you want when you get back, we can store it for a small fee on our lot as long as it is paid in full. Free for U.S troops overseas with military ID. Contact for more details. Terms & Conditions SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! The complete satisfaction with your purchase is our top priority. For that reason, we guarantee that the vehicle you purchase from us meets or exceeds your expectations, or we will refund your payment in full, less a $150.00 processing fee. Below is how it works...After securing the new vehicle purchase, either by a deposit or with full payment, buyer has one week to complete the transaction. Within that 7 day period, buyer may view, inspect, and test drive the vehicle personally or use a 3rd party service to insure that the vehicle meets their expectations, and that they are satisfied with the vehicle AS-IS. If for any reason the buyer is not completely satisfied with the outcome of the inspection, we will cancel the deal and refund all funds paid by the buyer, less $395.00 zurich shield fee. Buyer must complete inspection before completing purchase and/or the vehicle leaves our facility. We do allow test drives accompanied by your sales professional. Buyer is also responsible for any inspection cost or expenses.When buying sight unseen and having it shipped, you have 48 hours from the time you take possession or 50 additional miles on the odometer to inspect the vehicle and to contact us about canceling the deal. Buyer will be responsible for the cost of shipping the vehicle back to our store and a $395 zurich shield fee. All funds and any prior payment will be refunded. Buyer will be responsible for any damage that occurs while vehicle is in their possession. Once again, we want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------DEPOSITS: Buyer must contact us within 24 hours of auction end, and make arrangements for payment at that time. Buyer must pay an initial good faith deposit. A $500 deposit for units under $30,000 and $1000 deposit for units over $30,000 is due within 24 hours of end of auction, or immediately if buyer wishes to purchase before the auction ends. Deposit can be paid by any major credit card, certified check, or bank wire transfer. FUNDS/FINANCING: The full payment is due within one week of auction end. Please contact us for info on our financing options or seek pre-approval or commitment from a lender before purchasing. We usually can meet or beat the rates of your bank or credit union. We can arrange financing nationwide. Make sure if financing that your financial institution accepts this vehicle before bidding or placing an offer. Full payment can be made by certified check, bank wire transfer, and some online bank checks. We will work with your bank to properly expedite the transaction of funds. Special A.P.R subject to stipulations such as vehicle characteristics, including amount, term, & current year model. FEES & TAXES: All Texas Residents must pay applicable state and local tax, title and license fees. Texas residents pay 6.25% sales tax. Out of state cash buyers are responsible for their own state taxes and fees. If you are an out of state buyer and financing through one of our lenders, we will collect your state tax and send it to your local DMV or tax office. Buyer must pay applicable state and local tax, title and license fees that were not collected by us at time of registration. If too much is collected, buyer will receive a refund for the difference at time of registration.ALL SALES ARE SUBJECT to a $125 Documentary Fee and a $395 zurich shield fee for handling paperwork, filing titles, mailing and copying costs. And a Vehicle Inventory tax which is only 0.0017134 of the purchase price. Ex. $10,000 purchase = $17.64 VIT Taxes.AUCTIONS: All of our inventory is for sale locally and on other search engines. We reserve the right to sell this vehicle at any time through other venues, provided that the auction has not ended with a winning bidder. If you are interested, you do not have to wait for the auction to end. If no contact is made by winning bidder within 24 hours we reserve the right to relist the vehicle, report it to ebay, sell it to the next high bidder, or sell it otherwise. Due to many uneducated buyers, we have had to add an immediate paypal deposit when selecting the Buy it Now because of nonpaying bidders. If you are not signed up with paypal, please contact us and we can remove the deposit so you can select the buy it now. VEHICLES: If you are not sure about something please ask! We make every effort to present information that is accurate. However, it is based on data provided by the vehicle VIN decoding and/or other sources and therefore exact configuration, color, specifications & accessories should be used as a guide only and are not guaranteed. Do not assume anything not listed is included. We only have what we receive when we take possession of the car i.e.: Extra Keys, Keyless Entry, Floor Mats, Navigation Discs, Owners Manuals may not be included. Please call if you have any questions about these items. We will be happy to obtain floor mats and additional keys for you at minimal cost. We guarantee clean, clear, and lien free titles on all of our vehicles, NO salvage or reconditioned titles! Texas dealer title work can take up to 15 business days and will be sent to you with tracking #s. Miles posted in this listing may vary slightly do to local test driving, in-transit repairs, or road testing. Please be aware, that all of our vehicles listed on eBay are available on our lot. We will provide a 60-day temporary tag to every buyer which will allow them enough time to tag & title the vehicle. LOCAL: If you are not sure which vehicle you want to purchase and near by, just give us a call to schedule an appointment to view the vehicle. You do not have to place a deposit to take a test drive. To better serve you, we prefer to show vehicles by appointments. For Canadian Pre-Owned Car Buyers For Canadian Pre-Owned Car Buyers: If the title is to be released at the time of delivery (which is pretty much mandatory to get your vehicle thru customs), bank to bank wire transfer is your quickest way to handle this transaction. If buyers payment is not a bank wire transfer, i.e., certified bank check or approved loan check, the title will only be released when all funds have cleared. Please keep in mind that the funds verification process can take a few days. We cannot provide financing for Canadian customers. We will assist buyers with whatever documents you will need to clear Canadian customs, but knowing exactly which documents are required by your home province are the buyers responsibility. Requirements for Canada can be found at www.riv.ca under "Registration of import vehicles, Canada". We can arrange delivery to the nearest border town, from there you would take it over the border. If you want the car to be delivered directly into Canada over the border, we have a great relationship with a broker that delivers first class service at an affordable price. (approx rate for Canada: Alberta-$2125, B.C.-$1700, Manitoba-$2750, Nova Scotia-$2300, Ontario-$1500, Quebec-$1750) Limited Warranty 90Day / 3,000 Miles Certified Limited Warranty- Terms 90 days/3000 Miles This warranty is included with the negotiated price. There is no extra charge to activate this warranty. All of our vehicles go through a rigorous inspection and reconditioning process at our shop by our factory trained technicians. Each inspection and reconditioning is required to adhere to strict, factory-set standards to ensure that every vehicle’s engine, chassis and body is in excellent condition. ITEMS NOT MENTIONED IN THE BELOW LIST OF COVERED COMPONENTS ARE SPECIFICALLY EXCLUDED FROM COVERAGE. This warranty is not transferable and only valid in U.S. There is a $100 deductible per component failure. Repairs must be made at Hurst Autoplex Mitsubishi or approved by us prior to repair being performed. Total claims under this plan may not exceed $2000. Warranty excludes vehicles with performance modifications. Engine- All internally lubricated parts contained within the cylinder block, head(s), rotor housings, rotor chamber. Engine block and cylinder heads are covered only if damaged by an internally lubricated part. Transmission Auto- All internally lubricated parts in the manual transmission Transmission Manual- All internally lubricated parts in the transmission case. Transmission case is only covered if damaged by an internally lubricated part. Four Wheel Drive- Transfer case and all internal parts, drive shafts, (front and rear). The case/housing is only covered if damaged by the failure of an internally lubricated part. Drive Axle- Axle/final drive housing, all internally lubricated parts. The case/housing is only covered if damaged by the failure of an internally lubricated part. Since most of our inventory are late model vehicles with low miles, they usually are covered under the manufacturer warranty. All vehicles over 90k miles or 2001 and older are not covered under the Limited Warranty as well as certain exotic cars. Please do not assume that the vehicle is covered by our Limited Warranty. Contact us for more details. Location Hurst Autoplex240 NE Loop 820 Hurst, TX 76053 We are located in Hurst, TX in the heart of the Dallas/Ft. Worth metroplex. Description: Fusion Luxury Motors | eBay Template --> Year: 2006 Mileage: 12873 VIN: ZFFEW59A560149477 Primary color: Transmission type: 6-speed F1 style paddle shift manual transmission Engine: 8 Cylinder Engine 2006 F430 Spyder, F1, Only 12K miles, Carbon, Great driving and sounding car!! Designed by Pininfarina, the body styling of the F430 was revised from its predecessor, the Ferrari 360, to improve its aerodynamic efficiency. A great extent of Ferrari heritage was included in the exterior design. At the rear, the Enzo's tail lights and engine cover vents were added. The car's name was etched on the Testarossa-styled driver's side mirror. The large oval openings in the front bumper are reminiscent of Ferrari racing models from the 60s The F430's entirely new Power Plant, a 4.3L V8 was a significant departure for Ferrari, as all previous Ferrari V8's were descendants of the Dino racing program of the 1950s. The engine's output specifications are 483 HP at 8500 rpm and 343 lbft of torque at 5250 RPM. The connecting rods, pistons and crankshaft were all entirely new, while the four-valve cylinder head, valves and intake trumpets were directly retained from Formula 1 engines. The F430 has a top speed in excess of 196 mph and can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph 3.6 seconds, 0.6 seconds quicker than the old model. The F430 featured the E-Diff, a computer-controlled limited slip active differential which can vary the distribution of torque based on inputs such as steering angle and lateral acceleration. Other notable features include the first application of Ferrari's manettino steering wheel-mounted control knob which allows drivers to select from five different settings which modify the vehicle's ESC system, "Skyhook" electronic suspension, transmission behavior, throttle response, and E-Diff. This stunning Spyder is finished in Grigio Silverstone with Black interior and Black top. The interior features a tasteful amount of carbon and a yellow Rev Counter. Factory installed Scuderia Shields add to the amazing curb appeal of this Spyder. This F430 has a clean CARFAX and less than 13K Miles on it. A Clear Bra is installed and Tubi exhaust has been added and delivers the amazing sound only generated by a Ferrari. Great lease rates and Financing also available on any of our inventory! Description: ﻿ 844-582-6139 Visit eBay StoreContact Seller ✕ Image 1/65 Image 2/65 Image 3/65 Image 4/65 Image 5/65 Image 6/65 Image 7/65 Image 8/65 Image 9/65 Image 10/65 Image 11/65 Image 12/65 Image 13/65 Image 14/65 Image 15/65 Image 16/65 Image 17/65 Image 18/65 Image 19/65 Image 20/65 Image 21/65 Image 22/65 Image 23/65 Image 24/65 Image 25/65 Image 26/65 Image 27/65 Image 28/65 Image 29/65 Image 30/65 Image 31/65 Image 32/65 Image 33/65 Image 34/65 Image 35/65 Image 36/65 Image 37/65 Image 38/65 Image 39/65 Image 40/65 Image 41/65 Image 42/65 Image 43/65 Image 44/65 Image 45/65 Image 46/65 Image 47/65 Image 48/65 Image 49/65 Image 50/65 Image 51/65 Image 52/65 Image 53/65 Image 54/65 Image 55/65 Image 56/65 Image 57/65 Image 58/65 Image 59/65 Image 60/65 Image 61/65 Image 62/65 Image 63/65 Image 64/65 Image 65/65 See Full Size Photos View 360° Spin View Full Size Images View 360° Spin F1 TRANS, 15,191 ACTUAL MILES, CARBON CERAMIC BRKS, RECENTLY SVC'D, WELL DOC'D Stock #: 3000-DFW Exterior Color: Grigio Silverstone Interior Color: Bordeaux Red Transmission: 6 Speed Shiftable Automatic Drivetrain: RWD Fuel Type: Gasoline Fuel Engine: 4.3L V8 Title Condition: Clear Vehicle Description It's what many consider to be the quintessential Italian sports car and for good reason. Ferrari has been known for automotive engineering excellence for decades, producing some of the most inspired rides to ever hit the street. This Ferrari F430 is a great example - it's a world class head turner that's in super sharp condition and packs outstanding power under its hood. Unusually lightly travelled over the past decade plus and in top notch condition, it represents the opportunity... to own one of the world's most coveted performance cars. Ferrari has always occupied a singular niche among the exotic car manufacturers, combining cutting edge, almost futuristic styling sensibilities with a great sense of refinement. With its Grigio Silvertone exterior still in top notch condition, this F430 has a magnetism that few other cars could even approach, and it's as clean as can be. Take as long and close a look as you'd like - which in this case is likely to be VERY long and VERY close, and you won't find anything to detract from this iconic sports car's celestial curb appeal. It's one of Ferrari's most memorable models, but in reality it was only around for about five years, taking over from the well-respected 360 just a couple of years before this '06 first saw life. While it shares the same approximate chassis with its predecessor, the F430 offered even more extreme road hugging ability, due to the increased downdraft its revised exterior employs to hold the car to the pavement. With only about 15,000 miles under its belt, everything within exterior view presents exceptionally well, down to the pair of Scuderia Ferrari emblems on the front fenders. The Bordeaux red leather interior would be a show-stopper in virtually any condition but owing to the light driver and passenger traffic it's seen, it looks particularly impressive while reflecting Ferrari's unique melding of function and style. The optional power Daytona seats are heavily bolstered for support during spirited driving while carrying plenty of padding to provide comfort during everyday driving and they're looking as fresh as you could want, bracketed by door panels to each side, and a center console between them that reflect the same condition. The dash area, also in great form, is a conversation piece unto itself. Known as the optional Carbon Fiber Driving Zone with its carbon fiber inserts and dramatic but ergonomically well-laid out controls and gauges. are just awesome. The air conditioning system is prepared to cool down the cockpit with enthusiasm through no less than five vents in the dash, while an AM/FM/CD stereo is on standby to handle your audio needs. While the F430 is all about world class performance and aesthetics, the storage area up front is surprisingly roomy. Raise the rear hatch and you'll be transfixed by the sight of the 4.3 liter engine sitting inside. While its outstanding output - nearly 500 horsepower, enough to propel the F430 from 0-60 in well under four seconds - is its main calling card, its presentation in this setting has to be seen to be appreciated. The engine compartment is in showroom condition, allowing the powerplant's silver and red components to really stand out. The F430's low-profile, road hugging stance combines with the substantial downdraft Ferrari engineered in - as well as Ferrari's revolutionary E-Diff rear end, which varies the distribution of torque to the wheels based on steering angle and lateral acceleration - to produce world-class handling. 4-wheel carbon ceramic power disc brakes that feature sizable, heat-dissipating rotors bring the car to a stop from 60mph in just 114 feet - just a little over the length of a basketball court - as this performance icon creates excitement on its 19" stock Ferrari wheels outfitted with brand new Michelin Pilot Sport 4S tires. Whether the barometer is world class performance or world class looks, this Ferrari F430 stands in very select company. Call today! Contact us now at 844-582-6139 for more details! Description: ﻿ 844-582-6139 Visit eBay StoreContact Seller ✕ Image 1/63 Image 2/63 Image 3/63 Image 4/63 Image 5/63 Image 6/63 Image 7/63 Image 8/63 Image 9/63 Image 10/63 Image 11/63 Image 12/63 Image 13/63 Image 14/63 Image 15/63 Image 16/63 Image 17/63 Image 18/63 Image 19/63 Image 20/63 Image 21/63 Image 22/63 Image 23/63 Image 24/63 Image 25/63 Image 26/63 Image 27/63 Image 28/63 Image 29/63 Image 30/63 Image 31/63 Image 32/63 Image 33/63 Image 34/63 Image 35/63 Image 36/63 Image 37/63 Image 38/63 Image 39/63 Image 40/63 Image 41/63 Image 42/63 Image 43/63 Image 44/63 Image 45/63 Image 46/63 Image 47/63 Image 48/63 Image 49/63 Image 50/63 Image 51/63 Image 52/63 Image 53/63 Image 54/63 Image 55/63 Image 56/63 Image 57/63 Image 58/63 Image 59/63 Image 60/63 Image 61/63 Image 62/63 Image 63/63 See Full Size Photos View Video View 360° Spin View Full Size ImagesView Video View 360° Spin 1 OF 2 FROM FACTORY W/ RED TOP & SPOILER, ONLY 42K MILES, LOTS OF RECEIPTS, DOCS Stock #: 2851-DFW Exterior Color: Red Interior Color: Tan Transmission: 5 Speed Manual Drivetrain: RWD Engine: 3.2 Liter V8 Title Condition: Clear Vehicle Description It's the quintessential premium Italian sports car - the one you just can't help but admire as it passes by you on the highway - or even yet, as you walk by it parked right there - up front at the valet stand in spot "numero uno". This 1986 Ferrari 328 GTS looks that good, and it's in great shape too - having benefited from unusually light usage over the years - and carries a stack of maintenance records in... its glove box as proof that it's well-positioned to offer years of future driving excitement. The 328 cuts an immediately recognizable yet dramatic appearance. Its forerunner, the 308, was a huge success featured for years on television's "Magnum PI," no doubt prompting millions of viewers to admire the man beyond the wheel and think to themselves, "He's got some kind of life." Still clad in just the original shade of red you'd associate with this storied vehicle, you can see how this 328 represents a visual improvement over its predecessor, with its updated grille and more contoured bumpers painted to match the rest of the exterior. England's Motor Magazine put it best when they reviewed the 328 the year this one came out and said, "It's as close to a work of art as a car can be." All that visual magic is intact, and in fact this is one of only two that came from the factory with a red painted spoiler and targa top which itself is a great feature - affording the pleasure of open air motoring with the shelter of its lightweight panels just a couple of steps away. After more than 30 years of life, everything remains well-aligned, with flip-up headlights that raise promptly into position to reveal very clear lenses and clean buckets inside. The tan leather interior looks unusually fresh for its age, reflecting the notion that this performer has lived a sheltered life when not put to use. The bucket seats still have a very firm shape and show no pronounced wear marks or cracking on their surfaces, and are matched by a center console in between them that's just as clean with its chrome shifter and black control switches. The door panels on both sides were replaced a while back and don't show much evidence of use at all, and the power windows sitting inside them operate smoothly. The dash area looks great - you'll find a thorough assortment of easily readable gauges in the cluster and an arched black dash pad on top that, in spite of its color's sensitivity to UV rays, remains supple looking and split-free. An AM/FM/CD player stands by to provide your tunes while on the road. Some of the most welcome improvements gifted to the 328 are found in its drivetrain. The 3.2 liter V8 under the hood features more displacement than those before it and provides in excess of 260 horsepower - enough to rocket this lightweight car forward very convincingly. Ferrari was out in front of the curve as far as performance engineering, so you'll find independent suspensions both fore and aft and a sturdy anti-roll bar sitting in place to keep things level during hard cornering. The 5-speed manual transmission shifts very easily, the power rack and pinion is impressively precise and, with power disc brakes at all four corners, this GTS comes to a stop very quickly. Its timing belt - so often an Achilles heel for many cars - was replaced a few years ago to provide plenty of worry-free motoring and the stainless Tubi exhaust provides the perfect note. A true Italian classic, it sits on a set of 16" stock Ferrari wheels that have been refinished and wrapped with Michelin tires. This 1986 Ferrari 328 GTS represents the chance to put a classic example of Italian automotive design in your garage. Call today! Contact us now at 844-582-6139 for more details! Number 81 of 100 total US build! 1993 Ferrari 348 TS Speciale 2-Door Coupe Exterior Color: Red Interior Color: White Stock Number: F095619C Mileage: Only 23,888! Engine: 3.4 L V8 Fuel: Gasoline Transmission: 5 Speed Manual Warranty: As Is - No Dealer Warranty Title: Clear VIN: ZFFRG36A1P0095619 CARFAX: CARFAX Buyback Guarantee 60 Full-Size Photos Vehicle Features & Options Ask the Seller a Question Email this to a Friend Start Credit Application Vehicle Description Between 1992 and 1993 Ferrari made 100 limited edition units of 348 Serie Speciale of its TB and TS versions. It was only made for the US market. The main technical modifications from the 348 consisted in a revised engine which produced 312 hp at 7,200 rpm, a wider rear track (50mm), a free flow exhaust system, a shorter ratio final drive and Pirelli P Zero tyres. Ferrari indicated a 0-60 mph time of 5.3 seconds and a standing ¼ mile of 13.75 seconds. Several modifications were made to the exterior as well: new front spoiler to optimize aerodynamics similar to the F40, new front grill with chrome prancing horse, bumpers and rocker panels in body colour, engine cover in body colour, modified taillight assembly and new rear grill with chrome prancing horse. The cars were offered with F40 style sport seats in Connolly leather with the regular seats included as an option. The door panels were also modified and made of leather. Each car was numbered (1 to 100), with a 348 Serie Speciale plaque on the passenger's side door-post. This 348 TS Speciale has covered just 23,888 miles is its' well cared for life. The head covers have been powered coated, Scuderia Rampante gold connectors have been installed to eliminate electrical issues. The new owner will receive original factory keys, car cover, factory books and all associated maintenance records. About Gas Motor Cars, Inc Founded in 2011 by lifelong automotive enthusiast and Atlanta native Tony Marzullo, Gas Motorcars, Inc. is a family-owned and operated car dealership with headquarters located in Marietta, Ga. After spending several years in retail sales with AM General and Hummer, Marzullo decided in 2000 to open Global Auto Solutions, a full-service automotive concierge. Global’s mission was to help private individuals buy and sell vehicles. Acting as an independent broker allowed Marzullo to use his informed automotive knowledge in an objective fashion. Global never pressured a prospective buyer toward any specific product. Instead, Global’s mission was to find the right fit for the customer. This principled set of values, still maintained today, results in customers purchasing only what they need. For over 12 years, Global Auto Solutions, and now Gas Motorcars, Inc., transformed the car purchase and sale into the business of helping people save time and save money. Gas Motorcars’ clients consist of professional athletes, business owners, executives of Fortune 500 companies, doctors, attorneys, accountants, school teachers, housewives, and anyone who recognizes that their time is valuable and that the task of finding the proper vehicle is one that is best delegated to Gas Motorcars. Gas Motorcars, Inc. is a fully licensed and bonded car dealer in the state of Georgia. Gas Motorcars goal is to sell vehicles of only the highest quality. We do not sell cars with mystery stories. We do not charge extra fees. We do not waste our clients’ time. We provide a comfortable experience, free of hassle, with an honest approach to buying and selling cars. We know what we sell: the majority of the vehicles listed for sale are on consignment from existing clients, friends, and family. What we do: Pre-owned vehicle sales Pre-owned vehicle consignment sales Vehicle purchasing assistance Vehicle reconditioning Vehicle repair Wheel and tire repair Automotive shipping (both domestic and international) Be sure to visit our virtual showroom of inventory available for purchase. Description: Fusion Luxury Motors | eBay Template --> Year: 1999 Mileage: 26768 VIN: ZFFXR48A1X0113492 Primary color: Green Transmission type: 6 Speed Manual Engine: 8 Cylinder Engine 1999 Ferrari F355 Spyder, 6 Speed Gated Manual, Low Miles, Beautiful and Unique! The F355 was the evolution of the Ferrari 348. Design emphasis for the F355 was placed on significantly improved performance, as well as drivability across a wider range of speeds and in different environments such as low-speed city traffic. The major difference between the V8 engine in the 348 and F355 is the introduction of a 5-valve cylinder head. This new head design allowed for better intake permeability and resulted in an engine that was considerably more powerful, producing 375 HP and 268 ft-lbs of Torque. Aerodynamic designs for the car included over 1,300 hours of wind tunnel analysis. The car incorporates a nolder profile on the upper portion of the tail, and a fairing on the underbody that generates downforce when the car is at speed. Coupled with the engine improvements, this allowed the F355 to reach 60 MPH in a mere 4.5 Seconds with a quarter mile coming in 12.9 Seconds and a top speed of 183 MPH. An additional 1,800 hours of wind tunnel testing was conducted on the Spyder and F355 was the first Ferrari in history to have a semi-automatic convertible top. This unique example is finished in extremely rare Verde Silverstone and is a true head turner. With under 27K miles registered, she is very snappy and drives incredibly well. The gated 6-Speed Manual provides a true driving experience true to Ferrari's heritage. Complete with its origina tool kit and manuals. This example is finished in Nero over Beige leather with black piping, as well as an alcantara-fitted dash and headliner. It's 5.5L V12 engine produces 442 horsepower and 406 lb-ft of torque, and coupled with it's spacious 2+2 setup, this pre-owned luxury is more than just a racecar. The 456M first appeared in 1998, 'M' standing for 'Modificata,' which means, 'modified' in... Italian. Gran Turismo, or grand tourer, in Italian, is a term used to describe vehicles that have enough comfort and reliability to endure long-distance driving, but are fast enough to perform on the race track. One of the cars that embody this term, Gran Turismo, is the Ferrari 456, as it has race-inspired qualities with roadcar capabilities, and this used 456M is no exception. Description: Fusion Luxury Motors | eBay Template --> Year: 1999 Mileage: 24211 VIN: ZFFYR51A1X0117840 Primary color: Transmission type: 6-speed F1 style paddle shift manual transmission Engine: 8 Cylinder Engine 1999 Ferrari 360 Modena, Black on Black Beauty with only 24,000 Miles !!! The Ferrari 360 Modena, named after the birth place of Enzo Ferrari was introduced in 1999 and replaced the F355. It was the first production Ferrari to feature an all Aluminum space-frame which was 40% stiffer and 28% lighter than the steel one used in the F355.Along with a lightweight frame the new Pininfarina body styling deviated from traditions of the previous decade's sharp angles and flip-up headlights. The new V8 engine, utilizes a 3.6 liter capacity, flat plane crankshaft, titanium connecting rods and generates 395HP. Despite what on paper, looked like modest gains, in reality, the power-to-weight ratio was significantly improved on over the F355, due to the combination of both reduction in weight and more power. According to Ferrari weight was reduced by 60kg and the 0 to 60 mph acceleration time improved to 4.5 seconds. This Black Beauty has been meticulously cared for and has two large binders documenting all of the service records, original manuals, factory car cover, and factory tool kit. With a clean Carfax and only 24,000 Miles, she is an excellent value and won't disappoint. Tasteful mods include a clear bra to the top of the roof, rock guards by the wheel wells and a TUBI exhaust that creates an unbelievable sound only found on Ferraris. The power comes from the original 3 liter V8 with Webber carbs and drives out smooth and it has all the brash charm any Italian Sports car would want. That power is funneled through a correct 5 speed gear box. This an original solid and unrestored car. Did I already say that?. The paint is in good shape with the expected patina of a... 39 year old car. There are no chips or dings but there is some crazing in the finish. The interior is still like new and immaculate. It comes with lots of service records original manuals and tool kit not to mention copies of titles from the previous owners. The belts were changed at just under 25k miles according to one previous owner. If you have room in the barn for a Prancing Horse that will make its new owner proud and bring lots of smiles as it slips along the streets of its new home town don't be bashful. Notice not one Magnum reference has been made. Of course if one were to harken back to those days of glory and pronounced facial hair who could blame you?   Features • Finished in original Rosso Corsa or Ferrari Red code 20/R/90 as noted on the order confirmation letter • Interior code is VM3997 or Creama in Ferrari speak and is in immaculate condition • Black Dash and carpets code VM3282 • Correct Factory Instrumentation • 180 MPH Speedometer with 28k miles showing • Smooth 3 liter 8 cylinder and a nicely sorted out engine bay • Serviced and smooth operating 4 Weber 40DCNF 2-barrels • Full exhaust system with that undeniable Ferrari note • Fully Synchronized 5 speed gear box • Three Spoke Leather Wrapped Steering Wheel • Correct Shifter with full console and correct Shift Knob • 4 Wheel Disc brakes recently inspected and serviced   • Correct 14 inch Cromodora Wheels   • Newer blackwall 205/70VR14 Radial Tires • Dual Outside rearview and Interior rear view mirror • The door panels and dash are in excellent condition • Included are two binders with receipts specs and owner history • Also included is the original tool kit • In the trunk you will find the original matching spare with jack and mat Contact us now at 319-462-1045 for more details! Terms and Conditions We are a retail dealership and all of our vehicles are available for purchase online and at our physical location. As such, each vehicle is subject to immediate purchase from an eBay Buy-It-Now, selling to the highest bidder, an accepted offer or a walk-in customer. Many of our eBay listings will end early, so feel free to call 855-638-0284, email or message us if you see a vehicle you are interested in to verify its availability and condition. Payment, Fees and Taxes: Payments: A deposit of $500.00 USD must be paid within 24 hours of the close of the listing. You can call 855-638-0284, email or eBay message us to make arrangements to make the deposit. Most deposits are paid with a Credit Card. The remainder balance must be paid in full within three business days. Financing: We have a full service finance department and can provide financing on almost all of our vehicles at very competitive rates (often lower than what our customers are able to arrange through their own bank or credit union). Call 855-638-0284 if you would like to get pre-approved or have other questions. Purchase price: The advertised price and or eBay purchase price represents the cost of the vehicle as described in this listing and does not include any taxes, licensing, registration, shipping, dealer documentation fees $75 or any other fees required to purchase, transport, finance or register the vehicle. Taxes and Fees: New York Residents: We will take care of the entire registration process for you. In addition to the cost of the vehicle, you will be responsible for paying New York Fees – New plates would cost $260, transfer registration fee is $75 sales tax varies by county on purchase price less any applicable trade value plus the payment of the Dealer Doc Fee $75. In many cases, these costs and fees can be added to your loan if you are financing the vehicle. Out of State purchase: Buyer is responsible for the payment and knowing of their own states’ laws regarding taxes, fees and registration of this vehicle and assist in remitting the proper taxes, fees and documents for the registration of this vehicle in their state plus the payment of the Dealer Doc Fee $75. We will work with you through the registration process and in many cases; these fees and taxes can be added to your loan if you are financing the vehicle. General Terms and Conditions: Vehicle Condition: While we endeavor to have each of our vehicles accurately described and listed, occasionally there may be errors in features, pricing or other listing details. As such we recommend any prospective buyer reach out to our staff to verify any and all details prior to purchasing this vehicle. Call 855-638-0284 Buyer's Inspection: We welcome a Buyer's Inspection. If you plan to have a Buyer's Inspection, please make sure you have the vehicle inspected prior to the end of the auction. Inspection fees, if any, are the "Buyer's" sole responsibility. We are also happy to answer any questions, provide additional information or take additional pictures you want. Call us at 855-638-0284. Title information: Vehicle titles may be held by banks or lenders as collateral for loans. In many cases there is a delay in receiving the original instruments of up to 21 days from the time we pay a vehicle off. While we usually have all titles in our possession at closing, there are occasions where we may be waiting for them to arrive. Our friendly staff will be happy to work with you in the rare case of a delayed title. Shipping and Delivery: All shipping charges are the "Buyer's" responsibility. We are happy to assist you in finding a shipping provider for your vehicle. We assume no responsibility for damages incurred after the vehicle leaves our showroom. All shipping arrangements provided by us are strictly a courtesy. We are not affiliated with any carrier. Any claims or other communication regarding shipment of vehicles will be between you and the "Carrier" and not with us. The amount of time it takes for delivery depends upon the "Carrier" selected and the distance for delivery. A typical experience is 7-14 days from the date the vehicle is picked up from our facility until it is delivered to your destination. Verify with the "Carrier" for an Estimated Time of Arrival to be sure. In many cases the cost of shipping your vehicle can be added to your loan if you are financing. Picking up the vehicle in person: We are located 30 minutes from JFK International Airport, Newark International and LaGuardia international Airport and we can help you set up transportation to our location. Call with questions 855-638-0284. Finalizing Your Purchase: The eBay Buyer MUST communicate with us by e-mail or phone within 24 hours of winning a vehicle to place their deposit and make arrangements to complete the vehicle transaction. If we cannot confirm your intention to buy within 24 hours of winning the vehicle, we reserve the right to re-list this vehicle or sell to any other qualified buyer. Before the vehicle is released for shipment to the "Buyer", all sale-related and title-related paperwork must be signed and returned completed to the "Seller". If you plan on having your vehicle shipped to you, we will overnight the required paperwork to you with a return envelope for your convenience. Any and all differences must be addressed prior to the sale of this vehicle. Call with questions 855-638-0284. Thank you for your consideration, and we look forward to working with you. About Marino Performance Motors Greg Marino’s enthusiasm for automobiles started at an early age with the now classic Ford Mustangs. Driven by an intense interest of the cars he wanted to know them inside out, lifting engines and transmissions, restoring chassis, savoring the process of fine tuning and making adjustments to get optimum performance. Beginning in his teens working for years with one of the top dealerships in New England, Greg decided to venture off on his own. With a $10,000 loan on a small twenty car lot, he founded Auto-torium and over a span of 20 years built his business into one of New Hampshire’s largest and most successful dealerships. During this time he has continued his infatuation for exotic imports and Mustang Shelbys buying and selling within his private collection, and also by racing Porsches. Marino Performance Motors was sparked by Greg’s passion for finding the elite of performance, classic muscle cars and exotics at the best price. His mission is to provide you with the vehicle you’ve been searching for, not only to enjoy, but as an investment well below new model pricing eliminating the high financial losses attributed to purchasing new. For him these automobiles are an integration of artistic design and the ultimate in performance and technology. He looks forward to collaborating with clients who share this deep appreciation. With completion of a total remodel in 2017, our dealership fully embodies the excitement of the prancing horse. Tour our new showroom to fully experience our phenomenal collection of new and vintage Ferraris. The atelier at Ferrari of Tampa Bay is modeled after the original factory atelier in Maranello. Clients can relax with an espresso while configuring their dream vehicle right in the dealership. Ferrari of Tampa Bay is home to a fully viewable, state-of-the-art service facility that features nine service bays and factory-trained technicians, dedicated to taking pristine care of your Ferrari. Our ownerships unmatched Ferrari expertise coupled with decades-long experience restoring one-of-a-kind, multi-million dollar automobiles make Ferrari of Tampa Bay an easy choice when selecting a Ferrari dealer. From special events, to our Ferrari Challenge racing team to our staff and facilities, new prospects will find that the heart of our dealership is a passion that our customers recognize and that undoubtedly, sets Ferrari of Tampa Bay apart. About BJ Motors BJ Motors began as a passion for collecting fine automobiles and turned the enthusiasm and passion turned into a business that has thrived for over 25 years. Over 30 years of combined experience in selling some of the finest classic, sports, and exotic cars in the country. We are the largest pre-owned Dodge Viper in the country and loves other American brands as the Ford GTs for our main vehicle of choice. Our founder worked hard while spending time traveling all of the country racing Dodge Vipers and creating a network for obtaining the nicest, cleanest lowest mileage Vipers and Ford GTs in the market place. You can imagine the excitement of our typical day deciding which car to take out for a drive; whether it be a 600 hp Dodge Viper, or a 550 horsepower Ford GT, Lamborghini or Saleen S7! We have the right vehicle for you. Whatever your choice, you can be assured we have done our homework and stand behind the inventory we offer for sale. We have gone through each car with a fine tooth comb and have spent hours detailing our cars from top to bottom in order to ensure your satisfaction is guaranteed, reliability is bulletproof,and great looks are certain. It is our goal to make your purchase a great experience and also to make your dreams come true. BJ Motors is one of the areas largest performance and exotic sports car wholesalers in Houston, Texas, and specializes in the Dodge Vipers, Ford Gts. Lamborghinis. We offer a variety of financing options, and extended warranties through our business partners, enclosed nationwide shipping, and owners that are friendly and extremely knowledgeable. Give us a call or schedule an appointment to come and see our line of fine vehicles just waiting for you! We would like to be your source for any exotic vehicles in the market place today. With the majority of the depreciation out of the newer cars we sell, performance vehicles continuing to go up in value, and the fact that we would love to have our own cars back when something else catches your eye, you can see why it costs so little to own one. It is our goal to buy and sell the best of the best automobiles. Each and every car is hand picked for extremely high quality with low mileage. Each car is as important to us as it is to you. Every vehicle is inspected prior to purchasing it for our inventory. We take extra care to research the history and service of each of our cars, as well as conduct a complete and thorough detail process. Because we are certain that you will be pleased with your purchase, we offer the right of inspection before purchase. It is important to us that you have the option to inspect and approve the automobile before taking ownership, therefore this is offered to you before final payment is received. Check out our Inventory www.bjmotors.biz as it changes daily. If there is something you are looking for specifically and you do not see it here, please send us an e-mail and we will try and help you locate your vehicle. Thanks for visiting and check back often. This low mileage, in-door kept 2013 Ferrari 458 Spider is loaded with upgrades such as: F-1 Transmission, Ferrari Yellow Brake Calipers, Ferrari 458 Sport Style Dark Painted Finish Rims, Xenon Headlamps, Carbon Ceramic Brakes, Scuderia Ferrari Fender Shields, Yellow RPM Tachometer, Homelink, Sport Exhaust System, Carbon Fiber Racing Seats with Red Center Stripe, Outer B-Post Trim in Carbon Fiber, Rear Diffuser in Carbon Fiber, Front Wings in Carbon Fiber, Carbon Fiber Rear Molding, Carbon Fiber Side Rocker Panels, Carbon Fiber Driver Zone with LEDs, Carbon Fiber Dashboard Inserts, Handly Fire Extinguisher, Bluetooth, Red Stitching throughout Interior, and much more! This Ferrari 458 Spider signals the arrival of a brand new generation of V8-engined Ferrari convertibles. Every Ferrari is the result of an uncompromising design approach that integrates styling and aerodynamic requirements. The Pininfarina design features compact, aerodynamic lines, underscoring the concepts of performance-oriented efficiency that inspired the project. The nose features a single opening for the front grille and side air intakes, with aerodynamic sections and profiles designed to direct air to the coolant radiators and the new flat underbody. The nose also sports small aeroelastic winglets which generate downforce and, as speed rises, deform to reduce the section of the radiator intake and cut drag. The result is a highly innovative design, characterized by cutting-edge technologies perfected for use on a road-going car. Two of these innovations for production cars: the electronic differential (E-Diff) initially developed by Ferrari for its F1 single-seaters and designed to make the most of the engines torque to optimize traction, and the handily placed steering wheel-mounted rotary switch (better known to the Formula 1 drivers as the manettino) which directly controls the integrated systems governing vehicle dynamics. On the track, the E-Diff guarantees maximum grip out of bends, eliminating wheel spin. On the road it is a formidable technological refinement that improves roadholding. This 2013 Ferrari 458 Spider is equipped with Ferraris all-new 274.5 cubic inch V8 motor which produces approximately 560hp and goes 0-60Mph in approximately less than 4 seconds! It is also capable of speeds over approxmately 196Mph! The Ferrari 458s engines improvement in terms of performance, weight and reduction of overall dimensions is the result of applying Ferraris wealth of F1 experience to this fine sportscar. The F1 transmission in this beautiful exotic is state of the art, introducing a number of important modifications. Thanks to inputs from the engineers on the Gestione Sportiva racing side, the F1 Dual-Clutch gearbox management incorporates a new control strategy which further perfects gearchange speed and smoothness under hard use. The standard transmission is a Getrag dual-clutch 7-speed transmission, similar to the Ferrari California. There is no traditional manual option, making this the fourth road-car after the Enzo, Challenge Stradale and 430 Scuderia not to be offered with Ferrari's classic gated manual. Its the first mainstream model to not be offered with a manual transmission. The interior is noticeably bigger than its predecessor and has a better overall feel. This 2013 Ferrari 458 Spider is one of the finest examples of its kind! Please call our experienced sales staff to find out more on this absolutely stunning 458 Spider. This Scuderia Red with Black Interior 2013 458 Spider is currently in our in-door showroom and ready for immediate delivery! Driving Emotions. 561-845-3838. Title: 2013 Ferrari 458 Spider

Description: 2012 Ferrari 458 Spider 2012 Ferrari 458 Spider Chassis# 187301 Exterior: Blu Tour De France Interior: Beige Carpets: Beige The 4.5L 570 hp naturally-aspirated 2012 Ferrari 458 Spider revs to a sky-high 9000 rpm! And the cresting 398 lb-ft of torque at 6000 rpm can throw you back into your seat. One has only to hear the 458 Spider let loose the guttural F1-style scream to fully understand why one automobile magazine said of the 458 Spider that it "is perhaps the closest man has come to creating an animal." Indeed! The 458 Spider is the world's first retractable hardtop (RHT) convertible mid-engine supercar. The 458 Spider goes from coupe to convertible is just 14 seconds, and it is equipped with a retracting rear wind stop window to calm the winds within the cabin. On a practical side, the cargo bench behind the seats accommodates one full-size golf bag or two carry-on bags. Driving the 2012 Ferrari 458 Spider was so "amazing" that it brought British race car driver Vicki Butler-Henderson to tears! She says, "it's hard to imagine a car that makes you feel more alive than this! The 458 Spider is OUT OF THIS WORLD!" This particular 2012 Ferrari 458 Spider lived its life in Marin County not far from Ferrari of San Francisco. The previous owner is a distinguished member of the Ferrari of San Francisco famiglia and a true connoisseur of blue Ferraris; he has had many blue Ferraris grace his stable over the years. This Blu Tour de France 458 Spider is a beauty to behold, but take her out into the sunlight and she transforms from merely beautiful to breathtaking. This automobile was given meticulous care and was carefully driven only short distances making this 2012 458 Spider one of the lowest mileage 458 Spiders on the market today. Also, this 458 Spider represents an excellent value as one of the lowest priced 2012 Ferrari 458 Spiders around! Ferrari of San Francisco is one of the top-rated franchise dealers in North America ranked by Ferrari S.p.A. and Dealer Rater! As a leader in Ferrari's most prominent market, there are many reasons why many clients are proud to call themselves members of the Ferrari of San Francisco famiglia. Call (415) 380-9700 today to speak with one of our experienced sales consultants. We offer a consultive and collaborative approach, which is foreign to the automotive industry but serves to set the tone for an exhilarating, unique, and rewarding ownership experience. About Us FERRARI DEALERSHIP IN THE SAN FRANCISCO BAY AREA, SERVING THE BAY AREA "The Ferrari is a dream - people dream of owning this special vehicle and for most people it will remain a dream apart from for those lucky few." - Enzo Ferrari Ferrari of San Francisco is proud to serve Mill Valley, San Francisco, Marin, Berkley, Oakland and the entire Bay Area. Once located on Van Ness Avenue in San Francisco's bustling commercial district, Ferrari San Francisco was purchased by Ferrari North America in 1993. In 1994 Ferrari North America moved the dealership to Mill Valley, erecting a showroom and service center on a prime tract once occupied by a Humble Oil service station. Purchased by Boardwalk Auto Group in August 2009, Ferrari San Francisco is among the most distinctive Ferrari dealers in the world. It resembles a stunning Italian villa, tucked between the pristine waters of Richardson Bay and the rolling hills of Mill Valley. We are conveniently located at 595 Redwood Highway Mill Valley, CA 94941. Ferrari of San Francisco 595 Redwood Highway Mill Valley, CA 94941 P: (415) 380-9700 W: ferrarisanfrancisco.com

Contact Us Highlights SPECTACULAR CONDITION!RARE AND DESIRABLE EARLY FIBERGLASS 308MAINTAINED AND SERVICED SINCE THE EARLY 80’S BY MARQUE SPECIALISTSONE OF ONLY 100 DELIVERED TO NORTH AMERICAORIGINAL CALIFORNIA CARONLY 16,664 MILESGORGEOUS, FACTORY CORRECT COLOR COMBINATIONEXCELLENT DOCUMENTATION INCLUDING ORIGINAL OWNER’S MANUAL, JACK, TOOL KIT, SEAT COVERS, SERVICE RECORD COPIES AND MOREPERFORMS LIKE NEW!ONE OF THE BEST 308 GTB'S THAT CAN BE FOUND ON THE MARKETA COLLECTOR’S DREAM! Options Include: FACTORY AIR CONDITIONINGPOWER WINDOWS14” CAMPAGNOLO WHEELSBLAUPUNKT AM/FM STEREO The 308 is considered by many to be one of Ferrari’s greatest manufacturing and styling triumphs. The original 308 GTB released in 1975 was the first production Ferrari to be produced with a fiberglass body, excluding the front bonnet which was aluminium. These models are also sometimes referred to as the GRP (glass reinforced plastic) or Vetroresina (Italian for fiberglass) cars. The first production 308 GTB was unveiled at the Paris Salon in October 1975 and was an instant hit with the motoring press and general public. Fans of the Dino 246 GT were particularly pleased to see some of the design elements of the old car carried across, such as the scalloper air intakes on the side panels, twin tail lights and recessed curved rear window. The car also received the “wedge” treatment which was fashionable at the time, but unlike some of its contemporaries it was applied in restraint. The 1976 Ferrari 308GTB Vetroresina featured here is finished in gorgeous Rosso Chiaro Red with an impeccably kept tan leather interior. This original California car is among one of the most original, lower mile examples to come on the market in years; its meticulous maintenance has been documented with service records going back to the early 80s by marquee specialists. The original owner’s manual, jack, tool kit, seat covers also accompany this motorcar. We are proud to offer this incredible 308GTB Vetroresina to the most demanding collector or investor who wants the best. Classic cars have proven to be among the most resilient and rewarding investments in recent years with the Historic Automobile Group Index jumping 39% in 2013, 16% in 2014 and 17% in 2015 while posting gains of 467% over the last 10 years. Ready to make an investment you can actually enjoy? Please contact one of our expert sales consultants for more information. They will be happy to give you a complete walk-around, supply you with a more detailed description and answer any questions you may have. Buy with confidence. *Please note that even though this is a 1976 model, it is titled as a 1975* Year: 1976 Make: Ferrari Model: 308GTB Color: Rosso Chiaro Red Mileage: 16,664 Stock Number: 406873_Vetroresina Engine: 2,927CC 240 HP DOHC V8 Transmission: 5-Speed Manual Style: Coupe NADA VALUE $255,000.00 DISCOUNT $45,100.00 BUY IT NOW PRICE $209,900.00 Daniel Schmitt & Co. is located in beautiful and historic St. Louis, Missouri. Here is your chance to buy an unregistered 360 Modena F1 Spider, in Grigio Alloy metallic with navy blue leather interior, and with only 275 km (less than 175 miles) in it. The bottom line is: nobody sells or has one just like this anywhere in the world. This car is a prime example of the works of art in automotive history. There are very few things out there that are as pleasing to the eyes as this Ferrari. This car is European specifications, it was manufactured during the summer of 2002. It was purchased from Denzel Ferrari of Austria, the authorized Ferrari dealer at the time. The car will come with all original factory accessories, books and documentation. This Modena Spider has never been registered, and it is in new condition. EU taxes (VAT, etc.) has been paid on it. Of course, it would make a lot of sense to have this car in Europe, but it can be a priced possession anywhere. It was only driven at two local Ferrari shows at the request of the Ferrari dealership. This car has always been stored in temperature controlled garage in Budapest, Hungary and that's the location where it can be picked up by the buyer. After full payment I can assist in shipping or in continued storage.Any questions: please contact me on +1 713 408-3854 or via eBay.Note: I will be in Budapest for the next 2 weeks - I can show you this car personally.
